bill.title: Huntington’s Disease Disability Insurance Access Act of 2021
bill.description: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the five-month waiting period for disability insurance benefits under such title and waive the 24-month waiting period for Medicare eligibility for individuals with Huntington's disease.

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.
